likePostTaggedUserAction: liked a post you were tagged in
likePostMentionedUserAction: liked a post you were mentioned in
commentPostTaggedUserAction: commented on a post you were tagged in
commentPostMentionedUserAction: commented on a post you were mentioned in
quotePostTaggedUserAction: quoted a post you were tagged in
quotePostMentionedUserAction: quoted a post you were mentioned in
likeCommentMentionedUserAction: liked a comment you were mentioned in
replyCommentMentionedUserAction: replied to a comment you were mentioned in
